name: Express
description:
A short 2d shooter game with a 3 color limit and a multi-state system mechanic. Submission to the Minimalist Game Jam #1.

Multi and Minimalistic

The multiple states in the game are represented as sun(happy), raindrop(sad) and fire(angry). These are also 3 common states of human mind/emotion. Finding balance between collecting and expressing them is key. There is no background music, only a couple of short sfx for minimalist audio. There are 2 main colors used(black and white) and a 3rd color, which depends on the player's state.

Other Info

The game is probably buggy and laggy so I'm sorry in advance. The Windows ver. is probably less laggy. In the game, there is only a menu, a tutorial and a boss fight. To fight the boss, follow the instructions in the tutorial. Reaching 100% more or 0% less will break the bottle, the keeper of emotions(states).

As of now, the game is more of a prototype of an idea I was inspired by, but it could definitely be something worth expanding on the future. What do you think?

Comment any bugs you have encountered, suggestions, questions, etc.
